title: Practicum in Biostatistics A
description: This is the first course in a three-course sequence specifically designed for students enrolled in the MS in biostatistics program. Takes advantage of the extensive involvement of the program faculty in collaborative and interdisciplinary work within the life sciences. Didactic instruction on best practices in statistical collaboration. Under supervision, the students will participate in applied, real-life projects stemming from the research and collaborations of the faculty in the Division of Biostatistics. Prerequisites: successful completion of FMPH 221. Restricted to major code FM76.
